entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers or thunderstorms beginning this evening. Risk of a severe thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50. Low 20. Forecast issued 4:04 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to 17 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:04 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
